ru.spb.iac.cud.idp.web.util

Class GOSTXMLSignatureUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.spb.iac.cud.idp.web.util.GOSTXMLSignatureUtil

  • public class GOSTXMLSignatureUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for XML Signature Note: You can change the canonicalization method type by using the system property "picketlink.xmlsig.canonicalization"
    Since:
    Dec 15, 2008

      • sign

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document sign(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                        org.w3c.dom.Node parentOfNodeToBeSigned,
                        java.security.PrivateKey signingKey,
                        java.security.cert.X509Certificate certificate,
                        java.lang.String digestMethod,
                        java.lang.String signatureMethod,
                        java.lang.String referenceURI)
                                 throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                        java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                        javax.xml.crypto.MarshalException,
                                        javax.xml.crypto.dsig.XMLSignatureException
        Sign a node in a document
        Parameters:
        doc - Document
        parentOfNodeToBeSigned - Parent Node of the node to be signed
        signingKey - Private Key
        certificate - X509 Certificate holding the public key
        digestMethod - (Example: DigestMethod.SHA1)
        signatureMethod - (Example: SignatureMethod.DSA_SHA1)
        referenceURI -
        Returns:
        Document that contains the signed node
        Throws:
        javax.xml.crypto.dsig.XMLSignatureException
        javax.xml.crypto.MarshalException
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException

      • sign

        public static void sign(org.w3c.dom.Element elementToSign,

        java.lang.String signatureMethod,
        java.lang.String referenceURI)
                 throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                        javax.xml.crypto.MarshalException,
                        javax.xml.crypto.dsig.XMLSignatureException
        Sign only specified element (assumption is that it already has ID attribute set)
        Parameters:
        elementToSign - element to sign with set ID
        nextSibling - child of elementToSign, which will be used as next sibling of created signature
        keyPair -
        digestMethod -
        signatureMethod -
        referenceURI -
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        javax.xml.crypto.MarshalException
        javax.xml.crypto.dsig.XMLSignatureException

        public static void sign(org.w3c.dom.Element elementToSign,

        java.security.KeyPair keyPair,
        java.lang.String digestMethod,
        java.lang.String signatureMethod,
        java.lang.String referenceURI,
        java.security.cert.X509Certificate x509Certificate)
                 throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                        javax.xml.crypto.MarshalException,
                        javax.xml.crypto.dsig.XMLSignatureException
        Sign only specified element (assumption is that it already has ID attribute set)
        Parameters:
        elementToSign - element to sign with set ID
        nextSibling - child of elementToSign, which will be used as next sibling of created signature
        keyPair -
        digestMethod -
        signatureMethod -
        referenceURI -
        x509Certificate - X509Certificate to be placed in SignedInfo
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        javax.xml.crypto.MarshalException
        javax.xml.crypto.dsig.XMLSignatureException
